Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.description: This property contains the available OEM specific actions for this resource.
Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain any additional OEM actions for this resource.

CollectionFunction.description: An operation to perform over the sample.
CollectionFunction.longDescription: If present, the metric value shall be computed according to this function.

OemActions.description: The available OEM specific actions for this resource.
OemActions.longDescription: This type shall contain any additional OEM actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

SubmitTestMetricReport.description: This action is used to generate a metric report.
SubmitTestMetricReport.longDescription: This action shall cause the event service to immediately generate the metric report, as an Alert Event. This message should then be sent to any appropriate ListenerDestination targets.

MetricReportName.description: The Name property of the metric report in generated metric report.
MetricReportName.longDescription: This parameter shall be the value of the Name property in the generated metric report.

MetricReportValues.description: The content of MetricReportValues array in generated metric report.
MetricReportValues.longDescription: This parameter shall contain the contents of the MetricReportValues array property in the generated metric report.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

TelemetryService.description: This is the schema definition for the Metrics Service.  It represents the properties for the service itself and has links to collections of metric definitions and metric report definitions.
TelemetryService.longDescription: This resource shall be used to represent an Metrics Service for a Redfish implementation.  It represents the properties that affect the service itself.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: The Actions property shall contain the available actions for this resource.

LogService.description: This is a reference to a Log Service used by the Telemetry Service.
LogService.longDescription: The value of this property shall contain a reference to a LogService for the use by this Telemetry Service.

MaxReports.description: The maximum number of metric reports supported by this service.
MaxReports.longDescription: The value shall be the maximum number of metric reports supported by this service.

MetricDefinitions.description: A link to the collection of Metric Definitions.
MetricDefinitions.longDescription: The entries of shall be resources of type MetricDefinitionCollection.

MetricReportDefinitions.description: A link to the collection of Metric Report Definitions.
MetricReportDefinitions.longDescription: The value shall be a link to a resource of type MetricReportDefinitionCollection.

MetricReports.description: A link to the collection of Metric Reports.
MetricReports.longDescription: The value shall be a link to a resource of type MetricReportCollection.

MinCollectionInterval.description: The minimum time interval between collections supported by this service.
MinCollectionInterval.longDescription: The value shall be the minimum time interval between collections supported by this service.  The value shall conform to the Duration format.

Oem.description: This is the manufacturer/provider specific extension moniker used to divide the Oem object into sections.
Oem.longDescription: The value of this string shall be of the format for the reserved word *Oem*.

Status.description: This property describes the status and health of the resource and its children.
Status.longDescription: This property shall contain any status or health properties of the resource.

SupportedCollectionFunctions.description: The functions that can be performed over each metric.
SupportedCollectionFunctions.longDescription: The value shall define the function to apply over the collection duration.

Triggers.description: A link to the collection of Triggers, which apply to metrics.
Triggers.longDescription: The value shall be a link to a resource of type TriggersCollection.

title: #TelemetryService.v1_0_0.TelemetryService
